trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartTransformerCollection class is a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects, typically used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object to manage a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects for a connection.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartTransformerCollection è una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>oggetti, in genere utilizzati per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetto per gestire un set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>oggetti per una connessione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: The transformers related to a Web Parts connection can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Transformers%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quelli correlati a una connessione Web part possono essere recuperati tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Transformers%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Transformers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> to be added to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> da aggiungere alla fine di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index at which transformer has been added.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in corrispondenza del quale transformer è stato aggiunto.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular transformer exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica la presenza di un trasformatore specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object and determine whether it is part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Contains consente di verificare un particolare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>dell'oggetto e determinare se fa parte di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> che viene controllato per determinare se è nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular transformer is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se è presente un trasformatore specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia la raccolta in una matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> collection, a subset of those objects, or a superset of those objects.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CopyTo è utile quando si desidera comporre una matrice personalizzata che può contenere tutti il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>gli oggetti di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection>insieme, un subset di tali oggetti o un superset di tali oggetti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetti in cui viene copiata insieme.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Il punto iniziale nella matrice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il contenuto della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un membro specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> che fa parte della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che indica la posizione di un oggetto specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a transformer into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un trasformatore nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection"> </xref> raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which a value should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale deve essere inserito un valore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection and its items cannot be changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la raccolta e i relativi elementi non possono essere modificati. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of the collection based on its position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro della raccolta in base alla posizione nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> in a collection.
trans-unit.target: L'indice di un determinato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> in una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The located at index.
trans-unit.target: The located at index.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific transformer.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la prima occorrenza di un trasformatore specifico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> da rimuovere dalla raccolta.
